 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַ֫יִשׁ‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Job.4.11|Job 4:11]]</sup> ==lion== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵיתָא‎</span>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***nešu***</u></abbr>, ***lion*** is compare by [[BDB#Hal|Hal]] (compare [[BDB#Hpt|Hpt]]<sup>KAT 2, 510</sup>) [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ZA iii. 1888, 60</sup>); — ***lion*** [[Job.4.11|Job 4:11]]; [[Isa.30.6|Isa 30:6]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָבִיא‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גִּבּוֹר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּבְּהֵמָה‎</span> [[Prov.30.30|Prov 30:30]].
